E_T* Container< T >::FindOrAllocate ( S_T *  key  )  [inline] 

00170                                       {
00171                 if(key == NULL) {
00172                         const std::type_info &info = typeid(*this);
00173                         Debug::Log("CTOR of %s attempted for a NULL pointer! WTF!\n", info.name());
00174                         return NULL;

00178                         ++CTOR_Count;

00182                 }
00183                 return i->second;

E_T* Container< T >::LoadKey ( S_T *  key,
IStream *  pStm 
) [inline] 

00277                                               {
00278                 ULONG out;
00279 
00280                 const std::type_info &info = typeid(key);
00281                 Debug::Log("Loading Key [%s] (%X)\n", info.name(), key);
00282 
00283                 if(key == NULL) {
00284                         Debug::Log("Load attempted for a NULL pointer! WTF!\n");
00285                         return NULL;
00286                 }
00287                 E_T* buffer = this->FindOrAllocate(key);
00288                 long origPtr;
00289                 pStm->Read(&origPtr, 4, &out);
00290                 pStm->Read(buffer, buffer->Size(), &out);
00291                 Debug::Log("LoadKey Swizzle: %X => %X\n", origPtr, buffer);
00292                 SwizzleManagerClass::Instance.Here_I_Am(origPtr, (void *)buffer);
00293                 SWIZZLE(buffer->AttachedToObject);
00294 #ifdef DEBUGBUILD
00295                         assert(buffer->SavedCanary == typename E_T::Canary);
00296 #endif
00297                 return buffer;
00298         };
